pkgmetadata.longdescription: # r2pipe for PythonInteract with radare2 using the #!pipe command or in standalone scriptsthat communicate with local or remote r2 via pipe, tcp or http.## Installation```$ pip install r2pipe```or```$ pip3 install r2pipe```## Usage example:```pythonimport r2piper2 = r2pipe.open("/bin/ls")r2.cmd('aa')print(r2.cmd("afl"))print(r2.cmdj("aflj")) # evaluates JSONs and returns an objectprint(r2.cmdj("ij").core.format) # shows file formatr2.quit()```
